title: Installation issue: pythia6
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pythia6@6.4.28
...
```
hangs on a failed patch waiting to be told where the file to be patched is:
```
==> Moving resource stage
        source : /tmp/phskaj/spack-stage/resource-ttbar.lhe-jrgxssoalv7w6qhen43t7lagel7wq2jy/spack-src/ttbar.lhe
        destination : /tmp/phskaj/spack-stage/spack-stage-pythia6-6.4.28-jrgxssoalv7w6qhen43t7lagel7wq2jy/spack-src/example/ttbar.lhe
The text leading up to this was:
--------------------------
|--- src/pystrf.f.orig  2014-05-14 18:12:02.000000001 +0200
|+++ src/pystrf.f       2014-05-14 18:10:23.000000001 +0200
--------------------------
File to patch: 
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-1720-2aab415
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original

### Additional information

* I cannot find `spack-build-out.txt` or `spack-build-env.txt`.
* Several parts of this patch seem to be successfully applied 
* If I go into the temp directory where the pythia source is located I see that indeed there is no `src/pystrf.f` (actually no `src` directory at all).
* I do see that `./pystrf.f` does exist.
* If I manually enter the filename to the command prompt patch offers: `pystrf.f` then the build succeeds.

No maintainers are listed by the `package.py` however the patches section of this code was most recently touched by:  @chissg and @iarspider

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
